mapper.select: select * from (select bno, title, writer, regdate, replycnt, ROWNUM rn from (select bno, title, writer, regdate, replycnt from TBL_BOARD order by bno desc) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BOARD VALUES( seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITER = #{writer}, UPDATEDATE = sysdate WHERE BNO = #{bno}
